name: shrimp briouates
steps: Boil water. Add the Chinese vermicelli, turn off the heat, and let it sit for 10 minutes. Drain and roughly chop.
In a pan, sauté the onion in olive oil until translucent.
Add the shrimp and cook them (remove, chop into small pieces, then return to the pan).
Add the drained vermicelli, grated carrot, coriander, spices, and soy sauce. Mix well. Let cool.
Cut the brick pastry sheets in half (into semi-circles). Take a half-sheet and shape it into a triangle (briouate), placing the filling at one end.
Fry or bake at 180°C until golden brown.
